id.description: Unique identifier for the state data entry.

name.description: The name of the German state.

cases.description: Total number of confirmed COVID-19 cases in the state.

deaths.description: Total number of COVID-19 related deaths in the state.

deathsPerWeek.description: Number of deaths reported in the state in the current week.

recovered.description: Total number of recovered COVID-19 cases in the state.

abbreviation.description: The abbreviation or code representing a specific German state.

weekIncidence.description: Weekly incidence rate of COVID-19 cases per 100,000 people in the state.

casesPer100k.description: Number of COVID-19 cases per 100,000 people in the state.

cases.description: Change in the number of cases compared to the previous data update.

lastUpdate.description: The date and time of the last update of hospitalization data.
